title: MemberChangedHookMsg
description: MemberChangedHookMsg should be de/serialized under `MemberChangedHook()` variant in a HandleMsg This contains a list of all diffs on the given transaction.

MemberDiff.description: MemberDiff shows the old and new states for a given cw4 member They cannot both be None. old = None, new = Some -> Insert old = Some, new = Some -> Update old = Some, new = None -> Delete
